trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGMD110_04921_SEQ_00<tab>Alisaie regards the fallen soldier thoughtfully.
TEXT_KINGMD110_04921_TODO_00<tab>Inspect the fallen soldier.
TEXT_KINGMD110_04921_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Alisaie.
TEXT_KINGMD110_04921_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Alisaie.
TEXT_KINGMD110_04921_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Wuk Lamat at Sunperch.
TEXT_KINGMD110_04921_ALISAIE_000_001<tab>It's clearly not a person, but it doesn't look like any automaton or magitek weapon I've ever seen.
TEXT_KINGMD110_04921_ALISAIE_000_002<tab>As far and wide as you've traveled, though, perhaps you've encountered something similar before.
TEXT_KINGMD110_04921_ALISAIE_000_003<tab>Would you mind taking a closer look? It may yield some clues as to Zoraal Ja's new powers.

TEXT_KINGMD110_04921_SYSTEM_000_010<tab>Examine the fallen soldier. You may move the camera, as well as zoom in or out. Target an area and inspect it with <var 08 E4E95101 ((<var 48 F20222 /var><var 48 01 /var>)) ((<var 1E 10 /var> / <var 1E 09 /var>)) /var>.
TEXT_KINGMD110_04921_ALISAIE_000_011<tab>So, what do you think?
TEXT_KINGMD110_04921_Q1_100_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_KINGMD110_04921_A1_100_001<tab>It's unlike anything I've ever seen.
TEXT_KINGMD110_04921_A1_100_002<tab>It looks like a person, but it's clearly mechanical.
TEXT_KINGMD110_04921_ALISAIE_000_012<tab>Indeed... While it resembles a person, it has features that make it uncanny, the lack of a face not least of all. Did you see any sign of a power source?
TEXT_KINGMD110_04921_ALISAIE_000_013<tab>So it probably doesn't run on ceruleum or any other conventional fuels.
TEXT_KINGMD110_04921_ALISAIE_000_014<tab>I tried channeling aether into it earlier, but there was no response. That would seem to rule it out as an arcane entity.
TEXT_KINGMD110_04921_ALISAIE_000_015<tab>It's completely lifeless now─a far cry from the unstoppable enemy it was in battle...
TEXT_KINGMD110_04921_ALISAIE_000_016<tab>Even the material it's made of is a mystery. Rather than a metal, it's more akin to stone... Wait. Haven't we seen this somewhere recently?
TEXT_KINGMD110_04921_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_KINGMD110_04921_A1_000_001<tab>We have─in the Skydeep Cenote.
TEXT_KINGMD110_04921_A1_000_002<tab>The palace is made of stone too!
TEXT_KINGMD110_04921_ALISAIE_000_018<tab>That's right! The glowing stone used in the chamber with the gate to the golden city!
TEXT_KINGMD110_04921_ALISAIE_000_019<tab>Uh, yes, it certainly is. But it's nothing like what was used to craft this machine.
TEXT_KINGMD110_04921_ALISAIE_000_020<tab>Its stone is smooth and has a glow─like that which we saw in the chamber with the gate to the golden city.
TEXT_KINGMD110_04921_ALISAIE_000_021<tab>And while the soldiers are a different color, the warships are the same black as the stone of the gate itself.
TEXT_KINGMD110_04921_ALISAIE_000_022<tab>There has to be a connection. Let's share our observations with the others when we gather at Sunperch.
TEXT_KINGMD110_04921_ALISAIE_000_023<tab>The sooner we get to the bottom of this mystery, the better.
TEXT_KINGMD110_04921_ALISAIE_000_025<tab>At first, I assumed they were soldiers in armor. But when I cut them down, it became clear that wasn't the case.
TEXT_KINGMD110_04921_ALISAIE_000_030<tab>Looks like everyone is here already.
TEXT_KINGMD110_04921_ALISAIE_000_040<tab>We'll find a way to breach the dome, and we'll make sure everyone inside is safe.
TEXT_KINGMD110_04921_ALPHINAUD_000_045<tab>I fear we need to know more if we're to defend against another assault.
TEXT_KINGMD110_04921_YSHTOLA_000_050<tab>Another reflection encroaches upon our own, but how, and why now?
TEXT_KINGMD110_04921_GRAHATIA_000_055<tab>I'm indebted to Ojika for overseeing our operations in my absence. I will endeavor to make myself as useful as I can here.
TEXT_KINGMD110_04921_KRILE_000_060<tab>I struggle to believe I am from another reflection. I wonder, does this mean my soul is thinner than a native of the Source?
TEXT_KINGMD110_04921_KRILE_000_065<tab>Surely not. Y'shtola would have noticed. Gods, there's so much I don't understand, my head is ripe to burst...
TEXT_KINGMD110_04921_ERENVILLE_000_070<tab>Please be safe...
TEXT_KINGMD110_04921_WUKLAMAT_000_090<tab>I know what I have to do now.
TEXT_KINGMD110_04921_SUNPERCHGATEKEEPER_000_100<tab>Vow Wuk Lamat and the others are waiting for you. Right this way.
TEXT_KINGMD110_04921_SYSTEM_000_101<tab>Enter Sunperch?
